LDMX Software Documentation

LDMX C++ Software Framework providing a full Geant4 simulation and flexible event processing and analysis chain. The IO and analysis tools are based on ROOT, and detectors are described in the GDML XML language.

Refer to the ldmx-sw github for more information, including build and usage instructions.

Generated on 7 Jul 2017 for LDMX Software by  1.6.1
